1592390.name: Driving Simulator 2022
1592390.description:
Are you ready for the ultimate driving experience?

Driving Simulator just got a massive update!

Now you can explore brand new cars, test your skills in new game modes (Freeroam, Racing, Drift, Drag) and push your limits like never before.

Choose from a growing collection of vehicles – from supercars and motorcycles to unique rides – and take them for a spin on challenging maps. Customize your car’s look and performance, then prove your driving skills in multiple modes.

Whether you want to relax in Freeroam, compete in high-speed Racing, or master drifting, the choice is yours.

Key Features:

Over 11 vehicles to choose (new cars added!)

- 6 diverse maps with different challenges

- New Game Modes: Freeroam, Racing, Drift, Drag

-  Visual upgrades & car customization

- Damage System & realistic physics

- POV Camera Drive

- More features & updates coming soon!
1592390.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
